          <title>
            <string language="en">Origin of oil and gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprung des Öls und des Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Origine de pétrole et de gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Origem do óleo e do gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Origine di petrolio e di gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προέλευση του πετρελαίου και αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Origen del aceite y del gas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is second of four illustrations showing the formation of oil and gas underground. Here, the oil or gas gets trapped under the rocks because of the Earth movements.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fossil fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fossils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">underground</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses liegt an zweiter Stelle bei vier 
Abbildungen, welche die Anordnung von Öl- und Gasuntergrund zeigen. 
Hier erhält das Öl oder das Gas unter den Felsen wegen der 
Masse Bewegungen eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est en second lieu de quatre illustrations 
montrant la formation du souterrain de pétrole et de gaz. Ici, 
le pétrole ou le gaz obtient emprisonné sous les roches en raison 
des mouvements de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto é em segundo de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram a formação do subterrâneo do óleo e do gás. Aqui, o
óleo ou o gás começam prendido sob as rochas por causa dos 
movimentos da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è in secondo luogo di quattro illustrazioni 
che mostrano la formazione del underground del gas e del petrolio. 
Qui, il petrolio o il gas ottiene intrappolato sotto le roccie a
causa dei movimenti della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι δεύτερη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν το σχηματισμό του πετρελαίου και αέριο υπόγεια. 
Εδώ, το πετρέλαιο ή παίρνει αέριο παγιδευμένο κάτω 
από τους βράχους λόγω των γήινων μετακινήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto está en segundo lugar de cuatro 
ilustraciones que muestran la formación del subterráneo del aceite y
del gas. Aquí, el aceite o el gas consigue atrapado bajo las 
rocas debido a los movimientos de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
